Player History

Injured on 4/23/2012 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...

Traded from Colorado to Toronto on 7/31/2016 (Going to COL: P H. Street. Going to TOR: 3B C. Seager, P J. Nelson)...

Drove in 7 runs against Cleveland on 4/22/2017...

Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 2018...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 8/4/2019...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 2019...

Injured on 7/4/2022 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Atlanta on 7/20/2022...
